sectionText: Case Study: Endless Summer The 1966 classic film --The Endless Summer-- and related films and literature are used as lens for the historical-cultural study of human movement in the form of riding waves of water.  Surf culture and films are global phenomena and by using such as unique case studies, students gain mastery in cultural-interpretive theories, themes, and vocabulary, and in articulating perspectives on social roles, knowledge, and power.
